title: crypto/x509: reading certificates from PKCS12 files
body:
There is some interest to have a capability to read certificates from PKCS12 (.pfx/.p12) files in the golang standard library or the crypto sub repo. We have a package at https://github.com/Azure/go-pkcs12 that provides this capability and I'm looking for feedback on the API design. Moving https://github.com/Azure/go-pkcs12/issues/9 here.

CC: @agl @rakyll @dgryski @nathany @ahmetalpbalkan
